ai-patthana15.62:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.62:1.1_0: equanimity doesn’t arise dependent on the skillful.
ai-patthana15.62:1.1_1: Neither explained the skillful thing that gives rise to the unskillful and nothing.
ai-patthana15.62:1.1_2: Neither understands the skillful and what is full of equanimity.
ai-patthana15.62:1.1_3: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
ai-patthana15.62:2.1_0: equanimity doesn’t arise dependent on the unskillful.
ai-patthana15.62:2.1_1: Though the teaching is not explained by the unskillful.
ai-patthana15.62:2.1_2: Neither explained by equanimity and unskillful principles.
ai-patthana15.62:2.1_3: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
ai-patthana15.62:2.1_5: (This should be expanded as for the three roots of the following.)
